name: Hole In The Wall (itch) (CoPokBl)
description:
This game is simple, jump through the holes in the walls. They move faster over time and they are randomly selected. Controls are WASD for PC and there is a button to enable joysticks for android. I added a version for basically all platforms.

Platforms:

- Android

- Windows

- Mac OS

- Linux

- WebGL

I hope you enjoy :)
